name: Mr Jorries! (DEMO)
description:
MR JORRIES! (DEMO) 

Mr Jorries is a platformer shooter. Your goal is to shoot away all the 'boinks' to save the Jabco world! 

You've been called to save the Jabco world so it can remain a peaceful, happy, and safe world. You MUST do your job. 

//PLEASE NOTE://

This is only a demo, and not ALL artwork, graphics, SFX and music will be in the final product and the full version.
